messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Maconha Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Mysterious Figure

A mysterious figure has been detected on sensors at Restrooms

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Maconha Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Primary Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research Division Server Room.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failu*3mga;b4;'1v�-BZZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Maconha Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Paperwork Mishap Alert

A recent bureaucratic error in the Organic Resources Department may result in personnel shortages in some departments and redundant staffing in others.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Mysterious Figure

A mysterious figure has been detected on sensors at Starboard Maintenance

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: 7 A.M the Station plays its sounds in Black and White.
